TopicTitle: my career mode game switches to sandbox.

Articles.Content:
Hi,

When returning to base after a mission al buildings are upgraded and r&d/mission control are closed.

This all started after installing some mods....

I already tryed:

reinstalled the game, and looked fore missing files via steam.

reinstalled all mods, and one by one tested the latest additions.

Nothing changed and i'm not sure what to do now.

Thanks in advance.

p.s. im using kcan for mod instalation.

Edited March 1, 2018 by Gingerjezus420
fixed it my self, just started deleting mods and it tarted working fine. Not sure about the one that cause it.
